name: MIRACLE CASTLE (Demo)
description:
This is my first public demo for a (very) longtime project--Miracle Castle!

I use a lot of the VisuStella plugins to supplement the experience, but specifically
the features currently are:

On-map encounters with enemies
Romancing SaGa-style ability learning
Progressive magic learning via Skill Points
Romancing SaGa-style Life Point (Lives) system

I hope you all enjoy this love letter to many games that I've played over the years.

Music is (mostly) composed by me, with exception to the crisis battle theme (Scene 1 from RMMZ)
and the boss battle theme, which was co-written by Symfonikev (Youtube) and I.

Enjoy~!

--PLEASE credit me if you use RTP assets that I made, or animations I created. I would much prefer you not use the content in this game besides the RTP-default, and please don't use the music and pass on as your own. Thanks!
